alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 23 at 8:51AM CDT until June 25 at 11:17PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Madison and Rankin Counties. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and will fall below flood stage early Sunday morning and continue falling to 11.3 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Yockanookany River Ofahoma 19.0 21.5 Fri 7 am CDT 20.6 18.8 16.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CDT.
